TopicTitle: More Space Centers For When Multiplier Is Out

Articles.Content: KSP ( According to plans on wiki http://wiki.kerbalspaceprogram.com/wiki/Planned_features#cite_note-21 In Game & Engine category ) will one day have Multi-Player and it would not be pretty with 4 rockets taking off from the KSC launch pad at the same time ( by not be pretty means Lots Of Explosions ) the should be at least 2 other space center to chose from, and when not in use or Multi-Player space centers could be used by competing AIs...

We don't even know how multiplayer is going to look, a little early to suggest things like this for it.

Also multiplayer is still on the What not to Suggest list. Please check that list before you post, as suggesting things on it will only get your stuf locked
As Sirrobert said this is on the What Not To Suggest list. Please look there before posting in this Sub-Forum.
